name: RAD_THERAPY_ASSOC_COURSE
description: Lists external radiation courses linked to orders.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: RAD_THERAPY_COURSE_SRC_SYS_C_NAME
columns.description: This item is for orders representing treatments from courses of radiation documented in third-party software systems. The source system is specified in this item, and the ID of the course is specified in the counterpart Radiation Therapy Course ID (I ORD 77805).

columns.name: RAD_THERAPY_COURSE_IDENT
columns.description: This item is for orders representing treatments from courses of radiation documented in third-party software systems. The ID of the course is specified in this item, and the source system is specified in counterpart Radiation Therapy Course Source System (I ORD 77800).
